div.p: A FHIR API in front of the New Zealand NHI

tr.td: Used to retrieve a Patient resource by Id. **HTTP Request** 'GET' **Scope required:** patient:read / Patient.r

td.p: $Match (Find NHI) with In parameter onlyCertainMatches: 0 (False) An operation to search the NHI by demographics using fuzzy logic. Returns a bundle of results with match scores. HTTP Request 'POST'. Scope required: patient:search / Patient.s. $Match (Validate) with In parameter onlyCertainMatches: 1 (True) An operation to validate known patient demographic details against an NHI number. Returns a bundle of results with one patient resource that only includes the live nhi-id. HTTP Request 'POST'. Scope required: patient:validate / Patient.v
An operation to set the patient.name.preferred boolean to True. HTTP Request 'POST'. Scope required: patient:write / Patient.u
Allows a user to replace a physical address OR add or replace a postal address with an eSAM validated address. HTTP Request 'POST'. Scope required: patient:write / Patient.u
Allows a user to replace a physical address OR add or replace a postal address with an unvalidated address. HTTP Request 'POST'. Scope required: patient:write / Patient.u
Allows a user to remove a postal address from the nhi record. HTTP Request 'POST'. Scope required: patient:write / Patient.u
An operation to update a patient's birth details. HTTP Request 'POST'. Scope required: system/Patient.u, system/Patient.a
An operation to update a patient's identity details. HTTP Request 'POST'. Scope required: system/Patient.u, system/Patient.a
An operation to add a name to a patient's NHI record. HTTP Request 'POST'. Scope required: system/Patient.u, system/Patient.a
An operation to replace a name on a patient's record. HTTP Request 'POST'. Scope required: system/Patient.u, system/Patient.a
